name: 01-Project Overview
content:
Telco BTS Risk Management Analytical App

Project Overview

Objective:

The BTS Risk Management project aims to evaluate and predict the risk associated with deploying Base Transceiver Stations (BTS) across different cities in the USA. By analyzing audit, financial, and historical performance scores, the app helps telecom operators assess site viability, identify high-risk regions, and make informed infrastructure investment decisions.

Approach:

The solution applies a complete data science workflow:

  1. Data Profiling & Quality Checks – Assess the dataset for missing values and inconsistencies.
  2. Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) – Identify patterns and relationships between audit scores, financial scores, and BTS deployment risks.
  3. Feature Engineering – Combine audit and performance metrics to derive location-level risk indicators.
  4. Model Training – Use a Gradient Boosting Classifier to predict BTS risk probability.
  5. Prediction & Validation – Classify BTS deployments as Risky (1) or Not Risky (0) with performance evaluation.
  6. Predictive Insights – Highlight top 5 high-risk and low-risk cities, along with feature contributions.

Significance:

Deploying BTS infrastructure involves high capital expenditure and long-term operational commitments. Incorrect site selection or failure to identify risk factors can lead to:

  • Service outages.
  • Regulatory penalties.
  • Increased costs and delays.

By using predictive modeling, telecom providers can reduce deployment risk, improve decision-making efficiency, and ensure sustainable infrastructure growth.

Benefits:

  • Cost Avoidance: Prevents financial losses from risky deployments.
  • Efficient Resource Allocation: Directs investment toward low-risk, high-potential locations.
  • Enhanced Planning: Provides early warnings for cities likely to underperform.
  • Risk Transparency: Offers clear visibility into the drivers of BTS risk.
  • Improved Reliability: Ensures better connectivity and customer satisfaction through stable deployments.

Expected Outcomes:

  • A predictive model capable of classifying BTS deployments into risk categories.
  • Analytical dashboards visualizing BTS installation distribution and regional risk maps.
  • Ranked lists of top 5 high-risk and 5 low-risk cities for decision-making.
